title: What Danielle Brooks Can’t Live Without
text:
Olay Moisture Ribbons Plus Shea + Blue Lotus Body Wash

Normally, when I come out of the shower I have to put on lotions and oils, but this is kind of a twofer. I can wash my body with this, dry myself off, and I’m still hydrated. It smells good, which you know I’m into, but I’ve also noticed a difference in my skin after using it. [Editor’s note: Danielle is currently a brand ambassador for Olay.] When I was doing Shakespeare in the Park, the weather was constantly changing and my skin did not know how to adjust. It would freak out when we had to perform in the rain, or if it was 80 degrees. This has really balanced out my skin — and made it much softer.
description: Danielle Brooks of TV’s “Orange Is the New Black” on her favorite things, including “You Are a Badass” by Jen Sincero, KitchenAid mixer, JumpFromPaper backpack, Goodnight Darling Co. Ginger Mint Room Spray, Olay Ribbons Body Wash, and Apple AirPods.
